columns.Song_ID: The unique identifier for each song.
columns.Title: The name of the song.
columns.Singer_ID: The unique identifier for the singer performing the song.
columns.Sales: The total number of sales for the song.
columns.Highest_Position: The highest chart position achieved by the song.

song.table_description: The table stores song details, including sales and rankings.

columns.Singer_ID: The unique identifier for each singer.
columns.Name: The full name of the singer.
columns.Birth_Year: The year the singer was born.
columns.Net_Worth_Millions: The singer's net worth in millions.
columns.Citizenship: The country of citizenship for the singer.

singer.table_description: The table holds details about singers, including their net worth and citizenship.
